segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying that plate, it’s almost impressive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even seem to notice the water overflowing all around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, but she’s just standing there like it’s nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, and she has no idea what’s going on behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool like a little circus performer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe he hasn’t fallen yet—he’s really determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting patiently, like this is a normal thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is like a little adventure unfolding right in front of me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever turn around and catch them in the act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a fun and unexpected moment to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR
